Package de.espirit.common

Class CheckedException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • de.espirit.common.CheckedException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    de.espirit.common.LocalizableError, Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AuthenticationException, ElementDeletedException, ElementMovedException, LockException, MaximumNumberOfSessionsExceededException, ScheduleEntryRunningException
    public class CheckedException
extends Exception
implements de.espirit.common.LocalizableError
    This class CheckedException and its subclasses are a form of Exception that indicates conditions that a reasonable application might want to catch.
    Since:
    4.0.17
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        public void setErrorCode​(String errorCode)

        Parameters:
